title: Video: Benjamin Francis Leftwich – Back Home & Tour
content:
Breathy-voiced songsmith Benjamin Francis Leftwich has released a short 10-minute film, shot in his home county of Yorkshire whilst on tour with Noah and the Whale.

The video features an unplugged version of ‘Box of Stones’, from Leftwich’s debut album Last Smoke Before the Snowstorm. It’s all quite lovely, really.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d3c
